title: Burger Station
learnMore: In [Burger Station], you can swap NEO into divisible bNEO
networkErr: This network is not supported. Please connect to Neo N3 Mainnet.
mintFeeDetail: Including network fee and system fee.
redeemFeeDetail: Including network fee, system fee and swap fee, which is 0.001 GAS per NEO.
tip: Please make sure you have some GAS tokens to cover the transaction fee.
